Add sentiment analysis API with pattern management

- Implemented FastAPI-based REST API for sentiment analysis

- Contextual sentiment analysis using Llama 2 7B with rule-based detection
- Pattern management system with configurable text files
- Full CRUD API endpoints for managing sentiment patterns
- Docker containerization with docker-compose support
- Added negative_patterns.txt and positive_patterns.txt for easy pattern customization
